page.title: 14ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: {Blacksmithing}goes back centuries but people still do it now.There is a Blacksmith in Weaverham Mr.D.T Wilson. Who gave us this information.Black smiths now have a lot of electrical machines so their job is easier.But Blacksmiths still use these tools Blacksmiths Horns,Hollow Tongs,Leg Vices and welding equipment.Welding took 2 people but now 1 person can do it on their own.The fireplace is called a forge this is where the metal is melted so you can bend it into any shape you want.The anvil is used to put the metal on and hit it hard with a hammer to bend it. People think it is a very interesting job. But you have to pay bills and tax. It is a very hard job. Blacksmiths produce functional and ornamental metal work.
